test.name: csw:discovery.filter.getrecords.3.2
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the PropertyIsLessThan predicate expressed by a valid ogc:PropertyIsLessThan element.
test.comment: This test issues a GetRecords request using HTTP POST to the CSW server. The comparison operator PropertyIsLessThan is used for the dct:modified property for a value of '2006-06-13'. If the response returns with the number of records in the DB that are less than, 'before' in terms of a date value, the specified value (2006-06-13) then the test is valid, otherwise it fails.

request.body: <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" version="2.0.1" resultType="results" outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw"> <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:PropertyIsLessThan> <ogc:PropertyName>dct:modified</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>2006-06-13</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLessThan> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>
